Name: V.S.M. Flip
Ingredients: 20 ml De Kuyper Cr√®me de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chocolate sprayed glass.

Garnish: Spray glass with gold chocolate spray & grate dark chocolate over drink.
